Sentencas: The direct utilisation of primary fuels such as natural gas, green methane or ethanol represents a transition step towards a cleaner energy-based society.
Titulo: Influence of novel anode design on the performance and coke resistance towards methane directly-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This work shows the influence of a nickel-free intermediate anode layer, and a ceria-based functional anode composite, on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance when directly utilising dry methane without fuel pre-reforming.
Titulo: Influence of novel anode design on the performance and coke resistance towards methane directly-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A CeO2-Co3O4-CuO electrocatalyst was investigated by X-ray diffraction and X-ray fluorescence to confirm the presence of CeO2, Co3O4, and CuO phases.
Titulo: Influence of novel anode design on the performance and coke resistance towards methane directly-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To avoid thermal mismatches between the anode/electrolyte, an anode intermediate layer was developed and tested, with the aim of enhancing the thermal and chemical compatibility of components and oxygen ion transfer within the anode.
Titulo: Influence of novel anode design on the performance and coke resistance towards methane directly-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical properties of the assembled cells were evaluated by measuring i-V plots and electrochemical impedance spectra.
Titulo: Influence of novel anode design on the performance and coke resistance towards methane directly-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The addition of the intermediate layer substantially decreased the polarisation resistance of the cell and increased the electrochemical performance of the cell 2.5- to 5.5-fold depending on which fuel was being utilised.
Titulo: Influence of novel anode design on the performance and coke resistance towards methane directly-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy was performed to observe the integrity of the microstructure morphology of both anode assemblies.
Titulo: Influence of novel anode design on the performance and coke resistance towards methane directly-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The utilisation of dry methane was shown to be viable for operation from 750 to 850 degrees C within the developed cells.
Titulo: Influence of novel anode design on the performance and coke resistance towards methane directly-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, Raman spectroscopy and temperature-programmed oxidation tests confirmed that carbon deposition over the anode surface was negligible within the proposed configuration and materials design.
Titulo: Influence of novel anode design on the performance and coke resistance towards methane directly-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Accordingly, this study reveals that the addition of the intermediate layer is promising for improving SOFC performance and mitigating carbon coking under direct methane-fueled operation.
Titulo: Influence of novel anode design on the performance and coke resistance towards methane directly-fed solid oxide fuel cells
